verses.verse: I <S%H589><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> in mine <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Go <S%H1980>to<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I will <S%H5254>prove<s%> thee with <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> therefore <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> <S%H2896>pleasure:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>
I <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> It is <S%H1984>mad:<s%> and of <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2090>it?<s%>

I <S%H8446>sought<s%> in mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H4900>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1320>myself<s%> unto <S%H3196>wine,<s%> yet <S%H5090>acquainting<s%> mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> and to lay <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H5531>folly,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H834><s%> I might <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H335>what<s%> was <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4557>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of their <S%H2416>life.<s%>
I made me <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H4639>works;<s%> I <S%H1129>built<s%> me <S%H1004>houses;<s%> I <S%H5193>planted<s%> me vineyards: <S%H3754><s%>
I <S%H6213>made<s%> me <S%H1593>gardens<s%> and <S%H6508>orchards,<s%> and I <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> in them of <S%H3605>all<s%> kind of fruits: <S%H6529><s%>
I <S%H6213>made<s%> me <S%H1295>pools<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> <S%H4480>therewith<s%> the <S%H3293>wood<s%> that bringeth <S%H6779>forth<s%> trees: <S%H6086><s%>

I <S%H7069>got<s%> me <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H8198>maidens,<s%> and <S%H1961>had<s%> servants <S%H1121>born<s%> in my <S%H1004>house;<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> I <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H4735>possessions<s%> of <S%H1241>great<s%> and small <S%H6629>cattle<s%> above <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H7945>were<s%> <S%H1961><s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me:

I <S%H3664>gathered<s%> me <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the peculiar <S%H5459>treasure<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%> and of the <S%H4082>provinces:<s%> I <S%H6213>got<s%> me men <S%H7891>singers<s%> and women <S%H7891>singers,<s%> and the <S%H8588>delights<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> as musical <S%H7705>instruments,<s%> <S%H7705><s%> and that of all sorts.

So I was <S%H1431>great,<s%> and increased <S%H3254>more<s%> than <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H7945>were<s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> my <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H5975>remained<s%> with me.

And <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7592>desired<s%> I <S%H680>kept<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them, I <S%H4513>withheld<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H8057>joy;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H8056>rejoiced<s%> in <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> my <S%H5999>labor:<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> my <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> my <S%H5999>labor.<s%>

Then <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> that my hands had <S%H7945>wrought,<s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and on the <S%H5999>labor<s%> that I had <S%H7945>labored<s%> <S%H5998><s%> to <S%H6213>do:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> was <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3504>profit<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> myself to <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H1947>madness,<s%> and <S%H5531>folly:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> can the <S%H120>man<s%> do that <S%H7945>cometh<s%> <S%H935><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4428>king?<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> hath been <S%H3528>already<s%> <S%H6213>done.<s%>

Then <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7945>that<s%> <S%H3426><s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H3504>excelleth<s%> <S%H4480>folly,<s%> <S%H5531><s%> as far as <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H3504>excelleth<s%> <S%H4480>darkness.<s%> <S%H2822><s%>

The wise <S%H2450>man's<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are in his <S%H7218>head;<s%> but the <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness:<s%> and I <S%H589>myself<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> that one <S%H7945>event<s%> <S%H4745><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H7136>happeneth<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> them <S%H3605>all.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> As it <S%H4745>happeneth<s%> to the <S%H3684>fool,<s%> so it <S%H7136>happeneth<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> to me; and <S%H4100>why<s%> was <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H3148>more<s%> <S%H2449>wise?<s%> Then I <S%H1696>said<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7945>also<s%> <S%H1571><s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2146>remembrance<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> more <S%H5973>than<s%> of the <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> seeing that which <S%H7945>now<s%> <S%H3528><s%> is in the <S%H3117>days<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%> And <S%H349>how<s%> <S%H4191>dieth<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> man? <S%H5973>as<s%> the <S%H3684>fool.<s%>

Therefore I <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2416>life;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> that is <S%H7945>wrought<s%> <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H7451>grievous<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>

Yea, <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5999>labor<s%> which <S%H7945>I<s%> <S%H589><s%> had <S%H6001>taken<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun:<s%> because I should <S%H7945>leave<s%> <S%H5117><s%> it unto the <S%H120>man<s%> that shall <S%H7945>be<s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me.

And <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> whether he shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H5530>fool?<s%> yet shall he have <S%H7980>rule<s%> over <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5999>labor<s%> wherein I have <S%H7945>labored,<s%> <S%H5998><s%> and wherein I have showed myself <S%H7945>wise<s%> <S%H2449><s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

Therefore <S%H589>I<s%> went <S%H5437>about<s%> to <S%H853>cause<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H2976>despair<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5999>labor<s%> which I <S%H7945>took<s%> <S%H5998><s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> whose <S%H7945>labor<s%> <S%H5999><s%> is in <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and in <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and in <S%H3788>equity;<s%> yet to a <S%H120>man<s%> that hath <S%H7945>not<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5998>labored<s%> therein shall he <S%H5414>leave<s%> it for his <S%H2506>portion.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1933>hath<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor,<s%> and of the <S%H7475>vexation<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> wherein <S%H7945>he<s%> <S%H1931><s%> hath <S%H6001>labored<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun?<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4341>sorrows,<s%> and his <S%H6045>travail<s%> <S%H3708>grief;<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> taketh <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7901>rest<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

There is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> for a <S%H120>man,<s%> than that he should <S%H7945>eat<s%> <S%H398><s%> and <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and that he should make his <S%H7200>soul<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315><s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> in his <S%H5999>labor.<s%> <S%H2090>This<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7200>saw,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> was from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H398>eat,<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> else can <S%H2363>hasten<s%> hereunto, <S%H2351>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> I?

For <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H5414>giveth<s%> to a <S%H120>man<s%> that is <S%H7945>good<s%> <S%H2896><s%> in his <S%H6440>sight<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and <S%H8057>joy:<s%> but to the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H6045>travail,<s%> to <S%H622>gather<s%> and to heap <S%H3664>up,<s%> that he may <S%H5414>give<s%> to him that is <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
